channel.title: 718 zones

item.title: 718 zones
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

OK so I added this to player.java

public void isAtEdge() { if (getX() >= 3091 && getX() <= 3499 && getY() <= 3098 && getY() >= 3488){ setCanPvp(false); sm("You are in a safespot!"); } else { sm("Your in a danger zone!"); setCanPvp(true); } }

But when I enter Edge bank (the coords are correct) it still says Iâ€™m in danger zone and I can attack others there.

Anybody know how to fix this?

Read full topic
